response.overview: This film was a flashback, showing the ruthless young founders of the OAC—led by the future Director Thorne—as they execute a series of simultaneous, globally-coordinated magical "heists" to capture or destroy all independent sources of power. It was intended to be a politically charged, stylized epic showing the "good" intentions (stopping magic-induced wars) that paved the road to a magical dictatorship. The climax centered on the final, brutal confrontation with the last sovereign of the ancient Magical Guilds in their hidden citadel, culminating in the creation of the Seal of the Forgotten
response.title: The Arcana Imperium: Sovereign's Fall
